headline: Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) Announces Updates to its AI and Data Cloud Platforms
summary: With a strong profitability outlook, Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) secures a spot on our list of the 14 Stocks That Will Double in the Next 5 Years. On September 25, 2025, Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) announced updates to its AI and Data Cloud platforms, including Salesforce Starter for SMBs, Agentforce for AI-powered agents, and Slack integrations to improve workplace […]

headline: Cisco Unveils Advanced AI-Powered Webex Contact Center Solutions and Industry Integrations
summary: Cisco (NASDAQ: CSCO) today announced enhancements to the Webex Customer Experience portfolio, including a new AI-powered tool for supervisors launching in early 2026 to unify quality management across the contact center. Cisco also unveiled AI customer momentum, deep industry integrations for seamless and secure experiences, and planned Webex ecosystem expansions in India and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Cisco also unveiled AI customer momentum, deep industry integrations for seamless and secure experiences, and planned Webex ecosystem expansions in India and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

summary: MSFT commits $30B in the U.K. to build AI infrastructure, expand local operations and strengthen global competitiveness.

headline: Eightfold AI Harnesses the Power of Humans with Salesforce in the Era of Agentic AI
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., Sept. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Eightfold AI announced an expansion of its relationship with Salesforce. Through this agreement, organizations will have access to talent intelligence solutions on Agentforce, an AI skills-powered Salesforce enhanced community, and improved agent-to-agent communication – with Eightfold being one of the early partners to offer a Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server that will be on AgentExchange. Why This Matters, NowThe World Economic Forum 2

headline: Grafana Labs Surpasses $400M ARR and 7,000 Customers, Gains New Investors to Accelerate Global Expansion
summary: NEW YORK, September 30, 2025--Grafana Labs, the company behind the open observability cloud, today announced the completion of a secondary transaction led by Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan, with participation from Sapphire Ventures and Tiger Global. Existing investors Lightspeed Venture Partners, GIC, Coatue, Sequoia Capital, CapitalG, and Lead Edge Capital also took part.

headline: Luzid’s Agentic AI Revolutionizes SAP and Salesforce Implementations and Accelerates Testing Script Generation by up to 10x for Reduced Implementation Timelines
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 30, 2025--Luzid is transforming enterprise software delivery through its agentic AI platform David, which slashes costs and streamlines implementations. Focused on SAP and Salesforce implementations, Luzid’s capabilities and early growth reflect high demand from enterprises that want to avoid the inefficiencies and failures of traditional software integrations.

headline: 1 Cash-Heavy Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Avoid
summary: Companies with more cash than debt can be financially resilient, but that doesn’t mean they’re all strong investments. Some lack leverage because they struggle to grow or generate consistent profits, making them unattractive borrowers.

raw.headline: 1 Cash-Heavy Stock to Keep an Eye On and 2 We Avoid

headline: Copado Appoints Gaurav Kheterpal as Chief Evangelist to Accelerate Global DevOps Community Growth
summary: Copado, the leader in AI-powered DevOps for business applications, today announced the appointment of Gaurav Kheterpal as Chief Evangelist to champion Copado's fast-growing global community and deepen its presence in India's thriving Salesforce ecosystem. The company is also establishing a new regional office in Jaipur and growing its current team in India.
